column4: Ok, just did a dis-upgrade to 10.04 and now everytime I restart/shutdown I get a "unmount of /dev/nbd0 failed" with a 10-second timeout.
So what is /dev/nbd0 ? Is it in fstab?  Or...?
First, let me ask you this:  Did you do apt-get upgrade   first? (Or in other words, did you fist make sure the old system was fully updated?)
